rationale: The segment contains an adjective ('major') modifying a noun ('increase') and an intensifier ('just') modifying 'imminent' (timing), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africa—in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks. That time [In 2015] there were [hundreds of] cases in Egypt alone that year in humans. And the thought was that [the thought/prediction], you know, ‘it [an influenza pandemic from H5N1]’s just imminent now that we're going to see an influenza pandemic from H5N1.’
